casebody.data:
Kornegay Family Farms, LLC, et al.
v.
Cross Creek Seed, Inc. 187PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 Andrew H. Erteschik, Attorney at Law, Steven B. Epstein, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Cross Creek Seed, Inc. L. Neal Ellis, Jr., Attorney at Law, Wake Forest, J. P. Williamson, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Kornegay Family Farms, LLC, et al. Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys.

The following order has been entered on the conditional motion filed on the 13th of May 2016 by NC Association of Defense Attorneys for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
